history.content:
Are minors in both eecs and data science allowed? On the website it seems that the only restriction is that you cannot get both an eecs and cs minor but I was wondering if there will also be a similar restriction for eecs and data science?

If it is possible to get both minors, are there restrictions on course overlaps. On the data science minor page,

https://data.berkeley.edu/academics/undergraduate-programs/data-science-minor

it says there is no restriction for multiple minors but was wondering if the CoE has a different policy. I was planning on using two of my upper division eecs electives for both minors.
history.subject: Minors in EECS + DS
